official_title: To prohibit Federal assistance for housing program administrative costs to States and local governments that do not limit liability relating to food donations for homeless individuals.

summary.text: Prohibits Federal assistance for housing program administrative costs to States or local governments that do not limit liability for food donations to charitable organizations and food banks.

titles.title: To prohibit Federal assistance for housing program administrative costs to States and local governments that do not limit liability relating to food donations for homeless individuals.
